alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Laramie County through 445 PM MDT... At 420 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Cheyenne to near Ranchettes to 7 miles east of Cheyenne to 7 miles southeast of South Greeley. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Cheyenne, North Cheyenne, Hillsdale, Ranchettes and Fox Farm-College. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 16 and 24. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 364 and 383. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
